arts.ttl: The 50 game Celtic form guide even Brendan Rodgers can't believe as boss sees 'history' on the horizon
arts.sum: Celtic lost just two games from FIFTY in 2024, a stat that has the boss gushing with pride
Watch highlights from the Scottish Premiership match between Celtic and St Johnstone.

arts.ttl: BBC pundit says Celtic star has ‘proven’ to Brendan Rodgers he shouldn’t have been dropped
arts.sum: Brendan Rodgers watched his side end 2024 with a bang when Celtic put four goals past St Johnstone, days after doing the same to Motherwell. Pat Bonner feels that Scales has now ‘proven’ to his manager that he shouldn’t have been put on the bench in the first place given his recent performances, as he told BBC Radio Scotland .

arts.ttl: Philippe Clement under pressure as Rangers fall 14 points behind leaders Celtic
arts.sum: Rangers fell further behind Premiership leaders Celtic ahead of their meeting at Ibrox

arts.ttl: Jota silence broken, Tierney trade off and clear Carter-Vickers exit stance – Celtic transfer state of play
arts.sum: It could be a busy January window at Celtic Park

arts.ttl: BBC reporter shares Celtic fans' reaction inside Parkhead as Rangers struggled at Motherwell
arts.sum: As the goals were going in at Fir Park, Celtic were putting away St Johnstone and news was filtering through about their rivals’ struggles inside Parkhead. Meanwhile, Rangers continue to struggle, and after their late defeat at St Mirren on Boxing Day, they backed it up by dropping points at Motherwell.

arts.ttl: They don't let you breathe: St Johnstone manager brands Celtic 'the best' after loss
arts.sum: St Johnstone manager Simo Valakari tonight expressed his admiration of Celtic's intensity and admitted he would like his side to learn from "the best".

arts.ttl: Pat Bonner says 'fans can't be too critical' of Arne Engels after Celtic beat St Johnstone
arts.sum: Engels has also had a mixed time following his big-money summer transfer, but Pat Bonner thinks he performed well against St Johnstone. After putting four goals past Motherwell on Boxing Day, Celtic did the same to St Johnstone to move 14 points clear at the top of the Premiership table.

arts.ttl: Philippe Clement's worry as Rangers drop points at Motherwell to fall further behind Celtic in the title race
arts.sum: Speaking after the match, Rangers boss, Philippe Clement was asked if he’s worried about his team leaking goals in his last two fixtures as the Ibrox gaffer prepares for his seventh Glasgow Derby of his short career in Glasgow. Philippe Clement defends Rangers team selection ahead of Celtic fixture

arts.ttl: Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers reacts to Cameron Carter-Vickers Bayer Leverkusen link
arts.sum: Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers was asked about reports linking Bayer Leverkusen with a move for centre-half Cameron Carter-Vickers tonight.
